name: Jalapeno Yummies
author: Kitty
summary: Stuffed jalapenos wrapped in bacon make a lively appetizer. Any extra cream cheese filling can be mixed with sour cream and turned into a great dip.
ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
6  fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded
½ cup sour cream, for dip
directions: Mix the cream cheese with the onion soup mix in a bowl until smooth
Fill the jalapeno pepper halves with the cheese mixture
Wrap each pepper with a piece of bacon to enclose the filling, and secure with a toothpick
Place peppers in a skillet over medium heat, and cook until the bacon is crisp on all sides, 10 to 15 minutes
To make the dip, place the sour cream in a bowl, and mix with any leftover cream cheese mixture
